00021         class user_type::user_type_impl : public type::type_impl
00022         {
00023         public:
00024 
00025                 user_type_impl(ETypeTag tag, const char* name, size_t size)
00026                         : type_impl(tag, ARCH_USERDEFINED, size)
00027                 {
00028                         type_impl::set_name(name);
00029                 }
00030 
00031                 ~user_type_impl()
00032                 {
00033                         for(size_t i = 0, size = m_attributes.size(); i != size; ++i)
00034                                 m_attributes[i]->release();
00035 
00036                         for(size_t i = 0, size = m_members.size(); i != size; ++i)
00037                                 m_members[i]->release();
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 void add_member(member* mem)
00041                 {
00042                         m_members.push_back(mem);
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 void add_attribute(attribute* attr)
00046                 {
00047                         m_attributes.push_back(attr);
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 size_t member_count() const
00051                 {
00052                         return m_members.size();
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 member* get_member(size_t i) const
00056                 {
00057                         return m_members[i];
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 size_t find_member(const char* name) const
00061                 {
00062                         for(size_t i = 0, size = m_members.size(); i != size; ++i)
00063                                 if(strcmp(m_members[i]->get_name(), name) == 0)
00064                                         return i;
00065                         return m_members.size();
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 size_t attribute_count() const
00069                 {
00070                         return m_attributes.size();
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 attribute* get_attribute(size_t i) const
00074                 {
00075                         return m_attributes[i];
00076                 }
00077 
00078         private:
00079                 typedef std::vector<member*> TMemberContainer;
00080                 typedef std::vector<attribute*> TAttributeContainer;
00081 
00082                 TMemberContainer m_members;
00083                 TAttributeContainer m_attributes;
00084         };

00090         user_type::user_type(ETypeTag tag, const char* name, size_t size)
00091                 : type(new user_type_impl(tag, name, size))
00092         {
00093                 m_impl = static_cast<user_type_impl*>(type::m_impl);
00094         }

00097 
00098         bool user_type::equal(const type* other) const
00099         {
00100                 return type::equal(other) && strcmp(name(), other->name()) == 0;
00101         }

00105         void user_type::add_member(const member& mem)
00106         {
00107                 member* nm = mem.clone();
00108                 nm->set_owner(this);
00109                 m_impl->add_member(nm);
00110         }

00115         {

00156         user_type::member_iterator user_type::find_member(const char* name, bool search_base, size_t offset) const
00157         {
00158                 size_t memcount = m_impl->member_count();
00159                 size_t p = m_impl->find_member(name);
00160                 if(p != memcount || !search_base)
00161                         return member_iterator(*this, p, offset); 
00162 
00163                 for(attribute_iterator it = attributes_begin(), 
00164                         end = attributes_end(); it != end; ++it)
00165                 {
00166                         if(it->get_type() == ATTR_BASE_TYPE)
00167                         {
00168                                 const base_type* bt = static_cast<const base_type*>(&*it);
00169                                 member_iterator it = bt->get_base().find_member(name, search_base, offset + bt->get_offset());
00170                                 if(it != bt->get_base().members_end())
00171                                         return it;
00172                         }
00173                 }
00174                 return member_iterator(*this, memcount);
00175         }

00179         void user_type::traverse_hierarchy(hierarchy_traverser& tr) const
00180         {
00181                 traverse_rec(tr, 0);
00182         }
00183 
00185 
00186         void user_type::traverse_rec(hierarchy_traverser& tr, size_t depth) const
00187         {
00188                 tr.EnterType(*this, depth);
00189 
00190                 for(attribute_iterator it = attributes_begin(), 
00191                         end = attributes_end(); it != end; ++it)
00192                 {
00193                         if(it->get_type() == ATTR_BASE_TYPE)
00194                         {
00195                                 const base_type* bt = static_cast<const base_type*>(&*it);
00196                                 bt->get_base().traverse_rec(tr, depth + 1);
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199                 tr.LeaveType(*this, depth);
00200         }
00201 
00203 
00204         static size_t calculate_offset_rec(const user_type& derived, const user_type& base, size_t offset)
00205         {
00206                 if(derived.equal(&base))
00207                         return offset;
00208 
00209                 for(type::attribute_iterator it = derived.attributes_begin(),
00210                         end = derived.attributes_end(); it != end; ++it)
00211                 {
00212                         if(it->get_type() == ATTR_BASE_TYPE)
00213                         {
00214                                 const base_type* bt = static_cast<const base_type*>(&*it);
00215                                 size_t soff = calculate_offset_rec(bt->get_base(), base, offset + bt->get_offset());
00216                                 if(soff != (size_t)-1)
00217                                         return soff;
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220                 return (size_t)-1;
00221         }
00222 
00224 
00225         size_t user_type::calculate_offset(const user_type& derived, const user_type& base)
00226         {
00227                 return calculate_offset_rec(derived, base, 0);
00228         }
